data.message: He's gained this platform with a lot of blood, sweat, and tears...and I seriously doubt he gives a single #fuck about what anyone criticizing him thinks. Just like the athletes deciding they won't stand for it anymore, he's joining in the fight against a lunatic president's grip on this nation and the tyranny that's attempting to rise again. And for all of the jerkoffs whining about his message and him losing fans, don't worry...there will be plenty of us buying this and more of his work to make up for you not buying one more.

replies.message: 👏🏻👏🏻👏🏻 coming from a troll with a fake FB account 😌...
Tony Martin  Lol, you can take your trolling elsewhere...but thanks for the applause
